repos.name: hana-structurer-one
repos.description: SAP HANA Extreme application that analyzes unstructured data (tweets) to retrieve information such as location, people, companies, and also sentiment analysis.

repos.name: scp-b1
repos.description: Sample web application to run on Cloud Foundry (SAP Cloud Platform) that integrates with SAP Business One.

repos.name: byd-assistant
repos.description: An Amazon Echo integration (Skill) with SAP Business by Design.

repos.name: scp-cf-12-factor
repos.description: Sample 12-factor app showing a ERP Agnostic Loosely Coupled Architecture. Part of the "Building the Intelligent Enterprise for SMBs" series.

repos.name: smb-summit-hackathon
repos.description: Build Blocks for the SAP SMB Summit Hackathons.

repos.name: smb-assistant-bot
repos.description: SAP SMB(B1&ByD) Assistant Bot based on SAP Conversational AI

repos.name: b1-assistant-lite
repos.description: A small Alexa Skill integration with SAP Business One.

repos.name: smb-dash-button
repos.description: An AWS IoT DashButton implementation for SAP Business One and SAP Business ByDesign.

repos.name: b1-smile
repos.description: Analyzes selfies using AWS Rekognition and posts results to Qualtrics survey.

repos.name: scp-byd
repos.description: Sample web application to run on Cloud Foundry (SAP Cloud Platform) that integrates with SAP Business ByDesign.

repos.name: b1-xo
repos.description: Integrates Qualtrics Survey responses with SAP Business One.

repos.name: byd-delta-events
repos.description: AWS Serverless app to retrieve events from SAP Business ByDesign based on delta data.

repos.name: byd-msg-einvoice
repos.description: How to call AFIP electronic invoice SOAP web services.

repos.name: byd-event-bridge
repos.description: A prototype built with SAP Cloud App Studio enables an event pub/sub mechanism for SAP Business ByDesign by plugging into modern cloud messaging services for side-by-side solution/extension development via an event-driven and loosely-coupled approach

repos.name: byd-taxengine
repos.description: This application is for partners looking to calculate tax rates and tax base amounts based on SAP Business ByDesign tax input data for the BADI “CalculationProcedureForTaxes.”
